name: Turtle Simulator 2
description:
Fully take control of a physically based R.E.S* turtle simulator in this charmingly enticingly frustratingly kinda super hard yet intuitive turtle simulator.

Introducing our first challenge: TIME ATTACK!

Don't forget to post your scores in the thread!

YOU:

  • Have PSP or XBox style controller (Logitech/unbranded all okay)
  • Want to separately control turtle's every move.
  • Are not stranger to LB, RB, LT, RT and use A (or other bottom row butt) for reverse gear

GAME

  • Wants to be played by you

*(Red Ear Slider)

Originally created for Tortle Jam
